snippet.title: Sonic Mania interview - Sega lets independent developers take the reigns
snippet.description:
We talked to Lola, the producer on Sonic Mania, about how they're the right people for the job. After playing, we have faith. 

Check out http://www.pcgamer.com for more coverage from PAX West 2016!
